data.title: About Me
paragraphs: Hello! I'm Luis Henrique, a Full-Stack developer passionate about creating digital solutions that are both elegant and efficient. With over 5 years of experience in the market, my focus is to transform complex ideas into robust and intuitive web applications, using best development practices to ensure scalability and a flawless user experience.

data.title: First Contact
paragraphs: My journey in technology didn't start with lines of code, but with the characteristic sound of a dial-up modem and the screen of an old tube computer. I vividly remember the first time I had access to a PC with Windows 98; it was a box full of mysteries and endless possibilities. I spent hours exploring Paint, organizing files into folders that led nowhere, and mainly trying to understand how that machine could create entire worlds inside a monitor. It was this childlike curiosity, this desire to unravel the 'magic' behind the screen, that planted the seed of my passion and guided me to the career I have today. That initial fascination never left me; it just evolved.

data.title: Gatuno
